page.title: 04Education in Flint
page.content: Of the{six schools}in Flint, we have a {Welsh medium}Primary school, a {Catholic}Primary and Secondary school, and an{English medium}Primary and High school. As well as our ordinary school subjects, which now include computer lessons, we have a wide variety of {extra-curricular activities.}At the Gwynedd Junior school, we produce an annual{school magazine.}Here is a poem from this year's magazine:- Children play hopscotch They run, jump and jog They tease each other Boys fight and kick and quarrel Girls scream, giggle and chatter Children play "tip" or "help" or touch the yellow lines We play hide and seek And "Death Square" In the playground It's noisy and busy and exciting
